Description: 4 beads in different shape and colour: A: very lightly segmented cylindrical bead made of white faience B: disc-shaped bead made of ostrich eggshell, relatively large, roughly shaped C: half preserved disc-shaped bead made of white faience D: half preserved disc-shaped bead made of light turquoise faience
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E12.7.B, under mastaba
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
